      • assignSources

        @PostMapping(value="/subjects/{login:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/sources")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MinimalSourceDetailsDTO> assignSources(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String login,
                                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                    MinimalSourceDetailsDTO sourceDto)
                                                                                                                                                             throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                                                                    org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        POST /subjects/:login/sources: Assign a source to the specified user.

        The request body is a MinimalSourceDetailsDTO. At minimum, the source should define it's source type by either supplying the sourceTypeId, or the combination of (sourceTypeProducer, sourceTypeModel, sourceTypeCatalogVersion) fields. A source ID will be automatically generated. The source ID will be a new random UUID, and the source name, if not provided, will be the device model, appended with a dash and the first eight characters of the UUID. The sources will be created and assigned to the specified user.

        If you need to assign existing sources, simply specify either of id, sourceId, or sourceName fields.

        Parameters:
        sourceDto - The MinimalSourceDetailsDTO specification
        Returns:
        The MinimalSourceDetailsDTO completed with all identifying fields.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • updateSubjectSource

        @PostMapping(value="/subjects/{login:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/sources/{sourceName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MinimalSourceDetailsDTO> updateSubjectSource(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String login,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String sourceName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      throws NotFoundException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.net.URISyntaxException
        POST /subjects/:login/sources/:sourceName Update source attributes and source-name.

        The request body is a Map of strings. This request allows update of attributes only. Attributes will be merged and if a new value is provided for an existing key, the new value will be updated. The request will be validated for SUBJECT.UPDATE permission. SUBJECT.UPDATE is expected to keep the permissions aligned with permissions from dynamic source registration and update instead of checking for SOURCE_UPDATE.

        Parameters:
        attributes - The Map specification
        Returns:
        The MinimalSourceDetailsDTO completed with all identifying fields.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the subject or the source not found using given ids.
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
